data_types

Interface Shape

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Circle, Point, Polygon, Rectangle, Segment, Triangle

    public interface Shape
    Interfejs za geometrijsku figuru. Sve klase u data_types paketu implementiraju ovaj interfejs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Racuna povrsinu zadate figure.

      Crtanje u swingu.

      Crtanje u javaFX-u.

      Racuna obim zadate figure.
      void translate(int dx, int dy)
      Translacija
